set_known_position.name: Set cover position
set_known_position.description: Sets a known position for the cover internally.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the cover to set the position for.

position.name: Position
position.description: The position of the cover, between 0 and 100.

set_known_tilt_position.name: Set cover tilt position
set_known_tilt_position.description: Sets a known tilt position for the cover internally.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: The entity ID of the cover to set the tilt position for.

position.name: Position
position.description: The tilt position of the cover, between 0 and 100.
